title: The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly.
body:
I am having some issues with the store, it keeps coming up as with this when I click on it:

> ï»¿
> 
> The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly.
> 
> 


It wont let me buy champions or skins. does anyone know hwo to troubleshoot this?

When i log on my sisters account, she can access the store fine..

replies.body: Its the same for me as well, not sure whats causing it. Hopefully it will be 'back shortly.'

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects or wherever you've installed LoL.
Delete lol_air_client
Let the launcher redownload it

That fixed it for me
I'm having the same problem. OSX 10.10.3, and I've tried both deleting/redownloading the lol_air_client folder and repairing the client, but it's still happening
Bumps do not work as well on the boards.

It seems to be an account thing, I tried accessing the store from my friends computer (PC) on my account, still didn't work. I am currently using OSX 10.9.5.
Hopefully its resolved soon, i sent in a ticket about it last night

Riot seems to be aware of the issue and is working to fix this:

"Network Operations – Last Friday at 4:13 AM
We're aware that some players are still experiencing a black screen when loading the store and are working to resolve this issue.
05/09/2015
Network Operations — We're currently investigating an issue where some players are seeing a black screen in the store." 

source: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na
That's NA and totally different sadly. They are experiencing just black screen, were experiencing white text - "Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly"

The screen is still black, although we get a message the NA issue could still be the same thing we're experiencing and the server status message was just undetailed. What proof do you have that it's "totally different"? Riot doesn't have to address the exact words you're getting on the screen to not address the same issue. It's possible that by them fixing this "black screen" issue it will fix whatever we're getting too (if they're different bugs that is). 

The fact its on the NA server status and not OCE doesn't mean anything. NA patches are received by OCE, as well. If they get a fix, so do we.
What OS are you on and who's your ISP?
I don't think this matters, since one account works, and another doesn't. if both didn't, then yeah, it might be the OS or their DNS, or their ISP

Well, if he's/she's accessing both these accounts from the same OS and ISP, I think that it *might* have something to do with it. Nevertheless, the main reason I want to know his/her OS is so that my instructions will actually apply to his/her computer. ISP is purely connection.

Happening to a lot of people lately, including me.

Is it happening to your main accounts or alt/smurf accounts? Is it happening on the accounts you're posting on?

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/VZXE9otA-the-store-is-currently-unavailable-we-will-be-back-shortly - another post
I fixed this by running a repair on my client.

yea its happening to me too
has anyone found a solution?
i want the ssw talon skin :3
